title: pixel 4 xl said pictures and photos occupied 34GB, but actually there are only few in the storage
content:
1. Android 10 , latest update 2020/5/5
2. When I am going to take photo, the camera prompt I run out my storage 
3. I follow the link to free up storage, but there are only app options, the backup photos and download are gray out
4. I go to Google Photos to free up space. The backup type is original resolution, I click free the space, it free about 100MB
5. I go to settings -> storage, it says I use 63GB and  there are 34G occupied by photos and pictures, 
6. I click into the photos and pictures, it shows 34GB occupied by Pictures
7, I click into the Pictures, it is opened by google photos, and it displays the pictures on this device, there are only few pictures, around 10 photos, and less than 5MB
8. I go to check my Google Account storage, I have 100GB plan, there are also 25GB free. and my plan is still have 5 month.
9. I use "Files" app, there are only few files in the storage , around 20MB.

What can I do to free up these ghost occupying storage space?
